sentences.en: Increase your total to the nearest full kilogramme.
sentences.cn: 将总数增加至最接近的整数千克.

sentences.en: Onthophagus taurus can pull 1, 141 times its own body weight -- the equivalent of a 70-kilogramme (154-pound) person being able to lift 80 tonnes, the weight of six double-decker buses.
sentences.cn: 屎壳郎可拖动相当于其身体重量1141倍的物体，这相当于一个体重70公斤（154磅）的人能举起重达80吨的六辆双层巴士。

sentences.en: She sells her eggs for 12 yuan every kilogramme.
sentences.cn: 她的鸡蛋以每公斤12元的价格出售.

sentences.en: Take a kilogramme of rice for instance , it is valuated differently from people to people.
sentences.cn: 就像一斤大米,不同的人着眼点不同, 它的价值也就不同.

sentences.en: Two years ago, flying goods from Nanjing or Shanghai to Europe cost up to $4 a kilogramme; today it the price is about $2.50.
sentences.cn: 两年前，从南京或上海空运货物至欧洲，每公斤运费高达4美元;如今的价格约为2.50美元。
